query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_oee_alert_history (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, config_id INT, alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'warning', target_name VARCHAR(255), current_value DECIMAL(10,2), threshold_value DECIMAL(10,2), message TEXT, acknowledged BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL, acknowledged_by INT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (config_id) REFERENCES iot_oee_alert_config(id) ON DELETE SET NULL);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS iot_oee_alert_history (id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, config_id INT, alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, severity ENUM('info', 'warning', 'critical') DEFAULT 'warning', target_name VARCHAR(255), current_value DECIMAL(10,2), threshold_value DECIMAL(10,2), message TEXT, acknowledged BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE, acknowledged_at TIMESTAMP NULL, acknowledged_by INT, created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY (config_id) REFERENCES iot_oee_alert_config(id) ON DELETE SET NULL);
